property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description: The name of the default file system. A URI whose scheme and authority determine the FileSystem implementation. The uri's scheme determines the config property (fs.SCHEME.impl) naming the FileSystem implementation class. The uri's authority is used to determine the host, port, etc. for a filesystem.

property.name: fs.grfa.impl
property.description: The FileSystem implementation for grfa: URI.

property.name: grfa.table.name
property.description: The name of the HBase table that stores the GiraffaFS namespace.

property.name: grfa.rowkey.class
property.description: Class that implements RowKey for the namespace table.

property.name: grfa.rowkey.caching
property.description: True if row key caching is enabled.

property.name: grfa.coprocessor.class
property.description: Class that implements coprocessor for namespace table responsible for managing block requests.

property.name: grfa.jar.file
property.description: The location of the Giraffa jar file HBase to use to find the Coprocessor class.
